@trishgreenhalgh 4. prejudice, misogyny, demagoguery or intolerance are not mental illnesses . We have expertise only in the last mentioned

@trishgreenhalgh 2 to speculate without appropriate information brings us into disrepute. I dislike Trump as a citizen, not a psychiatrist
@trishgreenhalgh 1. Psych assessments depend on detailed interview, review records,talking to informants etc, not media.
